NODE_ENV.description: If set to production will enforce all communication over TLS

SESSION_TTL.description: Session time-to-live which defaults to 2 hours

SF_LOGIN_URL.description: Salesforce login url user OAuth authentication (should be login.salesforce.com or test.salesforce.com)

SF_CALLBACK_URL.description: OAuth callback URL from Salesforce Connected App for user authentication

SF_CLIENT_ID.description: OAuth client ID from Salesforce Connected App for server to Heroku communication

SF_CLIENT_SECRET.description: OAuth client secret from Salesforce Connected App for server to Heroku communication

SF_PASSWORD.description: Password from Salesforce for server to Heroku communication

SF_USERNAME.description: Username from Salesforce for server to Heroku communication

ASSET_ID.description: Id of the Asset record in Salesforce to map the sent Platform Event to an Asset record

BEARER_TOKEN.description: Bearer token that the Electric Imp server must provide for authentication

PLATFORM_EVENT_NAME.description: Name of the Salesforce Platform Event to emit

ELECTRICIMP_AGENT_URL.description: URL to then Electric Imp server as copied from the Electric Imp UI for backend status and communication
